title: Graphic Designer
job_overview:
We're Hiring: Graphic Designer

Join one of the top-tier marketing firms and grow your creative career with us! Be part of a dynamic team where your bold ideas come to life, weâ€™re looking for a creative Graphic Designer to craft striking visuals and support high-impact marketing campaigns across both digital and print platforms.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and Figma
- Strong design sense: composition, typography, color, hierarchy
- Experience in digital, print, and UX/UI design
- Advanced PowerPoint presentation skills
- Skilled in PowerPoint, InDesign, After Effects, Canva, and WIX
- Bonus: Upgrade to see actual info experience

- Start part-time, grow to full-time
- 100% Remote
- Creative freedom & diverse projects
